name: The FCS is a mixture of 3,6-di-p-tolyl-2,5-dihydro-pyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (88.6 percent), 3-p-octadecyloxyphenyl-6-p-tolyl-2,5-dihydro-pyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (11.1 percent), and 3,6-di-p-octadecyloxyphenyl-2,5-dihydro-pyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (0.3 percent).
FoodContactSubstance: The FCS is a mixture of 3,6-di-p-tolyl-2,5-dihydro-pyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (88.6 percent), 3-p-octadecyloxyphenyl-6-p-tolyl-2,5-dihydro-pyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (11.1 percent), and 3,6-di-p-octadecyloxyphenyl-2,5-dihydro-pyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (0.3 percent).
